vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
διασπορ-ά, ἡ,
(διασπείρω) scattering, dispersion, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
__2 collectively, ={οἱ διεσπαρμένοι}, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
scattering, dispersion, Diaspora
primarily a scattering, as of seed; dispersion; in NT metonymy the dispersed portion of the Jews, specially termed the dispersion, Diaspora Jn. 7:35; Jas. 1:1; 1Pet. 1:1*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: dispersión (de los judíos o cristianos esparcidos alrededor del mundo greco-romano)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 分散 (狀態) (約 7:35)
2) 分散的人聚集處 (雅 1:1; 彼前 1:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 分散 (状态) (约 7:35)
2) 分散的人聚集处 (雅 1:1; 彼前 1:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự gieo vãi ; nghĩa là « sự phân tán » hay « tản lạc »
